summary: Diff adds a new “Number & Conversion Tools” hub card, wires a new 'number' page into App routing, creates a new NumberConversionToolsPage with multiple tools in tabs, and introduces a shared lib module (numberTools.ts) containing calculation utilities (percentage, tip, split bill, age, date difference, and time parsing/formatting; additional converters/utilities appear to exist but are truncated).

missing_requirements.requirement: Time duration calculator can compute duration between two times (with optional dates) and/or sum multiple durations.
missing_requirements.reason: The new page and shared lib show time start/end state and time parsing/formatting utilities, but there is no evidence in the provided diff summary of any UI or logic for summing multiple durations, nor any input model for multiple duration entries. The relevant parts of NumberConversionToolsPage.tsx are truncated before the time duration section completes.
